## ClickTextOptions.elementXPath property

XPath selector for the elements to match. By default matching `a`<!-- -->, `button`<!-- -->, `input`<!-- -->, `label`<!-- -->. `'//*'` to match any element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
elementXPath?: string;
```
